"Why are you depressed?": "What don't you understand?"
"Why don't you just cheer up?"
"So what's the problem?"
"I don't have much time..."
"Just be yourself"
"Return"

"Oh hey man...
I'm sorry, but could you leave me alone? I'm feeling pretty miserable right now."

"I just can't do anything right...
It's like I'm nothing but Yucreta's extra baggage. The Phantom version is even better than me!"
"Is this how it ends? I don't think I'll be able to recover from this... Where did it all go wrong..."

"……てか、いざショックだったのを
認めてみりゃ、案外落ち着くもんだな。
相棒に言われて気づいたぜ。"

"だからって、受け入れるのもな……
やっぱ、あいつのことは苦手だぜ。
真似するなんて、無理だし……"

"でも、あいつを見習わないと
おれは自分の弱さから逃げてることに
なる、のかな……？"
"You don't understand man, alright... I'm not like you, I can't just spring back up like that!"
"I don't know man, maybe I should end it here... I'll just quit ARKS and stop being such a dead weight to Yucreta..."
"Is this how it ends? I don't think I'll be able to recover from this... Where did it all go wrong..."

"……同じ状況になったら
相棒でも、ショックを受けるって？
自分を否定されるのはつらい、か。"

"相棒にそう言われると
少し気がラクになってきたな……
さっきは取り乱して、ごめんな。"
"You're right! This Assault Rifle wouldn't betray me like this!"
"I don't know man, maybe I should end it here... I'll just quit ARKS and stop being such a dead weight to Yucreta..."
"Is this how it ends? I don't think I'll be able to recover from this... Where did it all go wrong..."

"おいおい、頼むよ相棒！
ここは、おれの悩みを聞く流れだろ？
急に突き放すのはナシで頼むぜ！"
"I just don't want to disappoint my sister. Though I suppose I should just listen to her without question, but I get this funny feeling that is a bad idea..."

"でも、あいつを見習わないと
おれは自分の弱さから逃げてることに
なる、のかな……？"

"えっ、そんな！
面倒な人に話しかけちゃったなー
みたいな対応、やめてくれよ！"
"I just don't want to disappoint my sister. Though I suppose I should just listen to her without question, but I get this funny feeling that is a bad idea..."

"でも、あいつを見習わないと
おれは自分の弱さから逃げてることに
なる、のかな……？"

"真似する必要はない……？
おれの手本となるべき存在が
目の前に実在しても、か？"

"……それはアウロラが思う理想で
唯一の正解だとは限らない……か。
たしかに、そうだな……"
"So you're saying I should stop trying to be my sister and just be myself...? You know what dude, that is some sound advice!"
"Thanks buddy, I see the light now. I'm glad I was able to vent my worries to you!"
